TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
You have just proven string theory. Congrats.

Waiter, there's nothing in my soup!

Congratulations, you have faired far better than most of our Patrons.

 

Waiter, there's a small loan of a million dollars in my soup!

Yes, your loan Interest Rate is 50%, and you must pay it back by the next Friday the 13th.

Waiter! There's something unnatural in my soup!

Ah yes sir, that would be your spoon

 

waiter there's a message in my soup

Well, it's probably just a subscription notice for Reader's Digest!

Waiter, there seems to be a hawk in my soup.

We put it there to get rid of the mouse.

Waiter, my soup is expanding!

The more the better!

Waiter, there's a defunct satellite in my soup!

You need to be more careful when de-orbiting your spacecraft, imagine how much it's gonna cost to fix the roof!

Waiter, Jool is in my soup!

That's no Jool, that's a Jupiter!

Waiter, my soup is aiming a gun at me!

-Slaps on handcuffs- The soup is an undercover agent. You are under arrest for cannibalizing soup. What you say can and will be used against you in the court of law. 

Waiter! There's a Mosasaurus in my soup!

That must be one big bowl of soup ya got there buddy!

waiter, there's a deus ex machina in my soup!

And suddenly, Just when our heroes were surrounded, they were whisked away by the Heart of Gold! Cuz whats more improbable the a Deus ex Machina???

 

Waiter, there's a Hamtoro in my soup!

What ever you do, do NOT provoke it. You have no idea what that thing could do!

Waiter! There's an Olympian Whale in my soup! (read the post to get the memo)

You ordered a "large," sir. 

Waiter, theirs a tiny man screaming about cruelty to liquids in my soup!

He's from that place from Gulliver's Travels with the tiny people. Don't worry, he'll down in a minute.

Waiter, there's a star in my soup!

-instantly vaporizes entire city block-

Waiter! There's a locked thread in my soup!

12 hours ago, Panel said:

 

You ordered a "large," sir. 

 

"Large" is an understatement!

*Fishes it out* Hm, Kerbal History REINVENTED. A new victim of the banhammer.

Waiter, someone's doing soup-o-cide in my soup!

Let him be. He's already in enough pain...

Waiter, there's a cow playing poker with a seal in my soup!

But sir, that's exactly what you ordered! Oh wait. Did you order Cow and seal soup, and then say you were joking? I can't hear words in the correct order. *mutters* What did I just say?

Waiter, you're in my soup!

Quite tasty, is it not?

Waiter! There are multiple protozoa in my soup!

Whoops, sorry about that. Our radiosterilizer is on the fritz.

Waiter, there's--Why are you eating soup too?

-whispers- I'm not actually a waiter >:) -whispers-

Waiter! A massive rip in space time has appeared in my soup!

Seal it with duct tape!

Waiter, someone's clubbing seals in my soup!

Damn Navy, always getting drunk in people's soup!

Waiter, my soup bowl turned inside out and now the world is inside it and the soup is outside!

2 hours ago, ZentroCatson said:

 

Seal it with duct tape!

 

I see what you did there.

 

-Blub Blub-

Waiter! There are little baby vending machines in my soup! They drank all the broth!
